page.title: 12Employment in N.& O.Silton
page.content: Unlike the national trend there is no unemployment problem in this area,all men have work. The major source of employment within the region is in agriculture with 35% of those who completed our survey farmers or farm workers. A very large proportion of men living in Nether & Over Silton travel outside the region to work largely because of the A19 making major towns accessible. These are mainly professional/ managerial classes amongst them 7 Company Directors,a Bank Manager, Accountant,Surveyor and Teachers.These people have tended to move into the area within the past 10yrs.Established families are inclined to work locally. Only 10% of women have full time work. 45% work part time,including Domestic & Clerical Workers,a Designer,a Flower Arranger and a P.E Teacher.
